desc: 味方単体に一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える効果を与える

dictionary.lore: A miraculous statue made from Goddess Tears and Gospel Stones. A soul that receives its protection will be reborn once if slain. The statue gets its name from its angelic shape, but there are no records of such an angel existing in Grand Gaia or Elgaia. All that is known for sure is that it is not of this world.

name: 天使の像
